name: Vladyslav Fokin
summary: Full Stack Developer with experience in JavaScript/TypeScript, React, Next.js, and SEO. Initially started as an SEO Specialist before advancing into full stack development.

experience.seo: Analyzed websites and online stores, optimized content for search engines, developed strategies to boost organic traffic, and monitored SEO metrics for improved visibility.
experience.developer: Developed web applications using JavaScript/TypeScript, React, and Next.js. Implemented front-end and back-end features, API integration, payment and shipping systems, and authentication using Firebase/OAuth.

education.university: European University, Private Higher Educational Institution
